title: How to Follow or Join Another Player's Game on Roblox

steps.title: Open Roblox.
steps.content: Open Roblox. You can follow someone on Roblox using the app for mobile or console, or the PC desktop app, or in your web browser at https://www.roblox.com . If you aren't already logged into your Roblox account , do so now. Following someone lets you easily see what game they're currently playing on Roblox. You'll see their activity right from your home screen. Additionally, you'll be allowed to directly join their game (as long as you have permission to do so). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Search for a user.
steps.content: Search for a user. Use the search bar at the top to find your friend's profile page.

steps.title: Select ••• .
steps.content: Select ••• . This is in the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Select Follow.
steps.content: Select Follow . You will now be following the user. You'll see their profile on your home page, and you can join their games directly.

steps.title: Join a game.
steps.content: Join a game. If you want to join the user's game after following them, go to their profile or your homepage. Click Join Experience next to their username. [2] X Research source If you don't see this option, the experience may be full, or the user may have permissions disabled.
